> [[ Ancient Cathedral // PVP Disabled ]]

"Alright..." Ayla's voice echoes throughout the ancient cathedral's halls. You hear running water from outside, and the sound of distant hoof-beats on stone, but not much else. There's a pronounced hollowness to your own steps, and through cracks and gaps in the brick floor, you think you can see something below. A basement, perhaps an underground river? Likely, more of the abyss you beheld from above.

You and Nel are leading the group, with the other three following close behind as you walk down the aisle, weapons at the ready. He created a pretty suitable map of the area, but it's not terribly complicated. There's six pillars, three on either side of the room past the disheveled pews; it seems they once held up the ceiling, but are now mostly broken, though they still stand much taller than you. It's dusty, and dark, save for a faint light from outside, and more flecks of glowing quartz in the ceiling above.

> [[ 1/2 ]]
name: BSO
subject: [[ Broken Sky Online Quest - Session 5 ]]
